txt.en:
You can purchase recipes from novices and experts that represent your professions. These recipes are common and yield functional items with moderate benefit. Some recipes will drop in chests, from quests or from sentient enemies in the game world. These recipes will often appear as scrollcases containing a recipe for a particular profession and tier of proficiency. You may also find some recipes in the auction hall.

Some recipes that are found in loot, in this manner, are rarer and often used up in the creation of the item.

You can also purchase recipes from the LOTRO Store.
How do I get more recipes?
